articles.title: Hamas confirms death of its military chief Mohammed Sinwar months after Israeli strike
articles.description: Hamas has officially confirmed the death of its military chief, Mohammed Sinwar, several months after Israel announced that he had been killed in an airstrike. Sinwar was the younger brother of Yahya Sinwar, the former leader of the group.

articles.title: Brighton 2-1 Man City: Super subs James Milner and Brajan Gruda inflict second defeat on Pep Guardiola's side
articles.description: Brighton & Hove Albion secured a 2-1 victory over Manchester City in the Premier League. After Erling Haaland gave City the lead, Brighton staged a second-half comeback with a penalty from James Milner and a late winning goal from Brajan Gruda.

articles.title: Reform deputy Richard Tice hits back after Archbishop of York's intervention on migrant policy
articles.description: Reform UK's deputy leader, Richard Tice, has responded to criticism from the Archbishop of York regarding the party's immigration policy. The Archbishop described the plan to deport all asylum seekers arriving in small boats as an "isolationist, short-term kneejerk" approach, a characterization Tice rejected.
